Plot scatter of a variable vs ATAC difference

plot_variable_vs_response.Rd

Plot scatter of a variable vs ATAC difference

Usage

plot_variable_vs_response(traj_model, variable, point_size = 0.5)

Arguments

traj_model

Trajectory model object. Please run regress_trajectory_motifs first.

variable

Variable to plot.

point_size

Size of the points.

Value

ggplot2 object
